name: The Wild West Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who played Gary Cooper's bride in the movie 'High Noon'?
questions.explanation:
Grace Kelly.

	Gary Cooper won an Oscar for his role as the sheriff.

questions.text: Who was 'The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance' in the 1962 John Ford film?
questions.explanation:
John Wayne.

	An American classic. It also starred Jimmy Stewart and Lee Marvin.

questions.text: Which of the following is a fictional character?
questions.explanation:
Pecos Bill.

	Albert 'Lash' LaRue was an actor in class B westerns. Crockett and Carson were American frontiersmen.

questions.text: What 1939 movie starred John Wayne as the Ringo Kid?
questions.explanation:
Stagecoach.

	It was directed by John Ford and propelled Wayne to stardom.

questions.text: Who was the favorite western hero of Dennis The Menace?
questions.explanation:
Cowboy Bob.

	Dennis the Menace was considered a sophisticated Katzenjammer Kid.

questions.text: Which of the following is not a name of a famous cowboy's horse?
questions.explanation:
Traveler.

	Traveler was the horse ridden by General Robert E. Lee.

questions.text: In what state did the Oregon Trail begin?
questions.explanation:
Missouri.

	It crossed about 2000 miles to the Columbia River.

questions.text: 'The Loner' was a TV western that was on for less than a year in 1965-1966. Who starred as William Colton?

questions.explanation:
Chuck Connors.

	He was dismissed from service after being unjustly accused of cowardice.

questions.text: Kit Carson's wife was a member of what tribe?
questions.explanation:
Arapaho.

	Actually his first 2 wives were indian. (1 Arapaho and 1 Cheyenne)
